ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.testSuite

Class SolutionTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.usask.simlab.odeToJava.testSuite.SolutionTester

  • public class SolutionTester
extends java.lang.Object
    Test a set of IVP solutions generated with different stepsizes and tolerances against a reference solution for that IVP.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The component-wise absolute errors from each test.

      The stepsizes used for each test, corresponding to the tolerances.

      The solution times in milliseconds from each test.

    • Method Detail

      • add_IVPController

        public void add_IVPController(IVPController controller)
        Add an IVPController for generating a solution.
        Parameters:
        controller - An IVPController to add to the solution tester.

      • add_IVPController

        public void add_IVPController(IVPController controller,
                     java.util.Vector rtol,
                     java.util.Vector atol,
                     java.util.Vector initial_stepsizes)
        Add an IVPController for generating a solution that runs with different absolute tolerances, relative tolerances, and initial stepsizes.

        If the IVPController uses a constant step-size solver, the initial stepsizes are the stepsizes to be used, and both relative tolerances and absolute tolerances have no effect.

        Parameters:
        controller - The IVPController to add.
        atol - An array of absolute tolerances.
        rtol - An array of relative tolerances.
        initial_stepsizes - An array of initial stepsizes to use.

      • add_IVPControllers

        public void add_IVPControllers(java.util.Collection<IVPController> controllers,
                      java.util.Vector rtol,
                      java.util.Vector atol,
                      java.util.Vector initial_stepsizes)
        Add a collection of IVPController objects in order to generate generate solutions with different absolute tolerances, relative tolerances, and initial stepsizes.

        If the IVPController uses a constant step-size solver, the initial stepsizes are the stepsizes to be used, and both relative tolerances and absolute tolerances have no effect.

        Parameters:
        controllers - A collection of IVPControllers to add.
        atol - An array of absolute tolerances.
        rtol - An array of relative tolerances.
        initial_stepsizes - An array of initial stepsizes to use.

      • add_IVPControllers

        public void add_IVPControllers(java.util.Collection<IVPController> controllers)
        Add a collection of IVPController to generate solution.
        Parameters:
        controllers - A collection of IVPControllers to add.

        public void run()
         throws java.io.IOException,
                ReferenceTimeNotEqualException
        Compare each solution from the various IVPControllers to the reference solution.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Error reading the reference solution file.
        ReferenceTimeNotEqualException - The solution times are not equal.
